Sequence Information.Peptide Name: SpCrus5 (S. paramamosain crustin 5; type 2, antimicrobial protein; modular design; natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 6S=S; UCSS1a)

Literature.Author: Wang Y, Zhang C, Wang H, Ma H, Huang YQ, Lu JX, Li XC, Zhang XW.2018
Literature.Title: Involvement of a newly identified atypical type II crustin (SpCrus5) in the antibacterial immunity of mud crab Scylla paramamosain

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Active against Gram+ S. aureus, B. subtilis, and B. megaterium (MIC < 0.4-0.8 uM), Gram- V-alginolyticus (MIC>25 uM), V. parahaemolyticus (MIC <12.5 uM), V. harveyi, and E. coli (MIC <25 uM), fungi P-pastoris (MIC>25 uM), and C. albicans (MIC <1.6 uM). It agglutinates Gram+ bacteria (bacteria-agglutinating).Formatted 7/2021; 11/2024
